subcategory.name: Drawers
subcategory.description: Off-screen drawer examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS drawer components to add panels that slide in from the side for things like mobile menus, notifications, or forms. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))

    function onReady() {

        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div class="grid min-h-[500px] place-content-center bg-gray-900 scheme-dark">

                    <svg fill="none" class="absolute inset-0 size-full stroke-white/10">
                      <defs>
                        <pattern id="pattern-510798f3-74a4-4150-a0cf-4e93e8f4fbdf" width="10" height="10" x="0" y="0" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
                          <path d="M-3 13 15-5M-5 5l18-18M-1 21 17 3" />
                        </pattern>
                      </defs>
                      <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#pattern-510798f3-74a4-4150-a0cf-4e93e8f4fbdf)" stroke="none" />

  </el-dialog>
</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div class="grid min-h-[500px] place-content-center bg-gray-900 scheme-dark">
  <button command="show-modal" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-2.5 py-1.5 text-sm font-semibold text-white inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-white/20 in-has-open:opacity-0">Open drawer</button>
  <el-dialog>
    <dialog id="drawer" aria-labelledby="drawer-title" class="fixed inset-0 size-auto max-h-none max-w-none overflow-hidden bg-transparent backdrop:bg-transparent">
      <div tabindex="0" class="absolute inset-0 pl-10 focus:outline-none sm:pl-16">
        <el-dialog-panel class="ml-auto block size-full max-w-md transform transition duration-500 ease-in-out data-closed:translate-x-full sm:duration-700">
          <div class="relative flex h-full flex-col divide-y divide-white/10 bg-gray-800 shadow-xl after:absolute after:inset-y-0 after:left-0 after:w-px after:bg-white/10">
            <div class="flex min-h-0 flex-1 flex-col overflow-y-auto py-6 focus:outline-none">
              <div class="px-4 sm:px-6">
                <div class="flex items-start justify-between">
                  <h2 id="drawer-title" class="text-base font-semibold text-white">Panel title</h2>
                  <div class="ml-3 flex h-7 items-center">
                    <button type="button" command="close" commandfor="drawer" class="relative rounded-md text-gray-400 hover:text-white focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500">
                      <span class="absolute -inset-2.5"></span>
                      <span class="sr-only">Close panel</span>
                      <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-6">
                        <path d="M6 18 18 6M6 6l12 12" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />
                      </svg>
                    </button>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="relative mt-6 flex-1 px-4 sm:px-6">
                <x-placeholder>
                  <div class="relative h-full overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-dashed border-white/20 opacity-75">
                    <svg fill="none" class="absolute inset-0 size-full stroke-white/10">
                      <defs>
                        <pattern id="pattern-6f8790a4-1eec-49f6-b100-8b8248aa2a1b" width="10" height="10" x="0" y="0" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
                          <path d="M-3 13 15-5M-5 5l18-18M-1 21 17 3" />
                        </pattern>
                      </defs>
                      <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#pattern-6f8790a4-1eec-49f6-b100-8b8248aa2a1b)" stroke="none" />
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                </x-placeholder>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="flex shrink-0 justify-end px-4 py-4">
              <button type="button" command="close" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-white inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 hover:bg-white/20">Cancel</button>
              <button type="submit" class="ml-4 inline-flex justify-center rounded-md bg-indigo-500 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-white hover:bg-indigo-400 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500">Save</button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </el-dialog-panel>
      </div>
    </dialog>
  </el-dialog>
</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div class="grid min-h-[960px] place-content-center bg-gray-900 scheme-dark">
  <button command="show-modal" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-2.5 py-1.5 text-sm font-semibold text-white inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-white/20 in-has-open:opacity-0">Open drawer</button>
  <el-dialog>

                      </svg>
                    </button>

                      </div>

                  <div class="pt-4 pb-6">
                    <div class="flex text-sm">
                      <a href="#" class="group inline-flex items-center font-medium text-indigo-400 hover:text-indigo-300">
                        <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-5 text-indigo-400 group-hover:text-indigo-300">
                          <path d="M12.232 4.232a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 3.536 3.536l-1.225 1.224a.75.75 0 0 0 1.061 1.06l1.224-1.224a4 4 0 0 0-5.656-5.656l-3 3a4 4 0 0 0 .225 5.865.75.75 0 0 0 .977-1.138 2.5 2.5 0 0 1-.142-3.667l3-3Z" />
                          <path d="M11.603 7.963a.75.75 0 0 0-.977 1.138 2.5 2.5 0 0 1 .142 3.667l-3 3a2.5 2.5 0 0 1-3.536-3.536l1.225-1.224a.75.75 0 0 0-1.061-1.06l-1.224 1.224a4 4 0 1 0 5.656 5.656l3-3a4 4 0 0 0-.225-5.865Z" />
                        </svg>
                        <span class="ml-2">Copy link</span>
                      </a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mt-4 flex text-sm">
                      <a href="#" class="group inline-flex items-center text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-200">
                        <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-5 text-gray-600 group-hover:text-gray-300">
                          <path d="M18 10a8 8 0 1 1-16 0 8 8 0 0 1 16 0ZM8.94 6.94a.75.75 0 1 1-1.061-1.061 3 3 0 1 1 2.871 5.026v.345a.75.75 0 0 1-1.5 0v-.5c0-.72.57-1.172 1.081-1.287A1.5 1.5 0 1 0 8.94 6.94ZM10 15a1 1 0 1 0 0-2 1 1 0 0 0 0 2Z" clip-rule="evenodd" fill-rule="evenodd" />
                        </svg>
                        <span class="ml-2">Learn more about sharing</span>
                      </a>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="flex shrink-0 justify-end px-4 py-4">
              <button type="button" command="close" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-gray-100 inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 hover:bg-white/20">Cancel</button>
              <button type="submit" class="ml-4 inline-flex justify-center rounded-md bg-indigo-500 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-white hover:bg-indigo-400 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500">Save</button>
            </div>
          </form>
        </el-dialog-panel>
      </div>
    </dialog>
  </el-dialog>
</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div class="grid min-h-[960px] place-content-center bg-gray-900 scheme-dark">
  <button command="show-modal" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-2.5 py-1.5 text-sm font-semibold text-white inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-white/20 in-has-open:opacity-0">Open drawer</button>
  <el-dialog>
    <dialog id="drawer" aria-labelledby="drawer-title" class="fixed inset-0 size-auto max-h-none max-w-none overflow-hidden bg-transparent backdrop:bg-transparent">
      <div tabindex="0" class="absolute inset-0 pl-10 focus:outline-none sm:pl-16">

            <div class="flex-1">

                    <h2 id="drawer-title" class="text-base font-semibold text-white">New project</h2>
                    <p class="text-sm text-gray-400">Get started by filling in the information below to create your new project.</p>
                  </div>
                  <div class="flex h-7 items-center">
                    <button type="button" command="close" commandfor="drawer" class="relative rounded-md text-gray-400 hover:text-white focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500">
                      <span class="absolute -inset-2.5"></span>
                      <span class="sr-only">Close panel</span>
                      <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-6">
                        <path d="M6 18 18 6M6 6l12 12" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />
                      </svg>
                    </button>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Divider container -->
              <div class="space-y-6 py-6 sm:space-y-0 sm:divide-y sm:divide-white/10 sm:py-0">
                <!-- Project name -->
                <div class="space-y-2 px-4 sm:grid sm:grid-cols-3 sm:gap-4 sm:space-y-0 sm:px-6 sm:py-5">
                  <div>
                    <label for="project-name" class="block text-sm/6 font-medium text-white sm:mt-1.5">Project name</label>
                  </div>
                  <div class="sm:col-span-2">
                    <input id="project-name" type="text" name="project-name" class="block w-full rounded-md bg-white/5 px-3 py-1.5 text-base text-white outline-1 -outline-offset-1 outline-white/10 placeholder:text-gray-500 focus:outline-indigo-500 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:-outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-600 sm:text-sm/6" />
                  </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Project description -->
                <div class="space-y-2 px-4 sm:grid sm:grid-cols-3 sm:gap-4 sm:space-y-0 sm:px-6 sm:py-5">
                  <div>
                    <label for="project-description" class="block text-sm/6 font-medium text-white sm:mt-1.5">Description</label>
                  </div>
                  <div class="sm:col-span-2">
                    <textarea id="project-description" name="project-description" rows="3" class="block w-full rounded-md bg-white/5 px-3 py-1.5 text-base text-white outline-1 -outline-offset-1 outline-white/10 placeholder:text-gray-500 focus:outline-indigo-500 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:-outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-600 sm:text-sm/6"></textarea>

                      <div class="relative flex items-start">
                        <div class="absolute flex h-6 items-center">
                          <input id="privacy-private" type="radio" name="privacy" value="private" aria-describedby="privacy-private-to-project-description" class="relative size-4 appearance-none rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-black/10 before:absolute before:inset-1 before:rounded-full before:bg-white not-checked:before:hidden checked:border-indigo-500 checked:bg-indigo-500 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500 disabled:border-white/10 disabled:bg-gray-800 disabled:before:bg-white/20 forced-colors:appearance-auto forced-colors:before:hidden" />
                        </div>
                        <div class="pl-7 text-sm/6">
                          <label for="privacy-private" class="font-medium text-white">Private to you</label>
                          <p id="privacy-private-description" class="text-gray-400">You are the only one able to access this project.</p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <hr class="border-white/10" />
                    <div class="flex flex-col items-start space-y-4 sm:flex-row sm:items-center sm:justify-between sm:space-y-0">
                      <div>
                        <a href="#" class="group flex items-center space-x-2.5 text-sm font-medium text-indigo-400 hover:text-indigo-300">
                          <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-5 text-indigo-400 group-hover:text-indigo-300">
                            <path d="M12.232 4.232a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 3.536 3.536l-1.225 1.224a.75.75 0 0 0 1.061 1.06l1.224-1.224a4 4 0 0 0-5.656-5.656l-3 3a4 4 0 0 0 .225 5.865.75.75 0 0 0 .977-1.138 2.5 2.5 0 0 1-.142-3.667l3-3Z" />
                            <path d="M11.603 7.963a.75.75 0 0 0-.977 1.138 2.5 2.5 0 0 1 .142 3.667l-3 3a2.5 2.5 0 0 1-3.536-3.536l1.225-1.224a.75.75 0 0 0-1.061-1.06l-1.224 1.224a4 4 0 1 0 5.656 5.656l3-3a4 4 0 0 0-.225-5.865Z" />
                          </svg>
                          <span>Copy link</span>
                        </a>
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <a href="#" class="group flex items-center space-x-2.5 text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-300">
                          <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-5 text-gray-600 group-hover:text-gray-400">
                            <path d="M18 10a8 8 0 1 1-16 0 8 8 0 0 1 16 0ZM8.94 6.94a.75.75 0 1 1-1.061-1.061 3 3 0 1 1 2.871 5.026v.345a.75.75 0 0 1-1.5 0v-.5c0-.72.57-1.172 1.081-1.287A1.5 1.5 0 1 0 8.94 6.94ZM10 15a1 1 0 1 0 0-2 1 1 0 0 0 0 2Z" clip-rule="evenodd" fill-rule="evenodd" />
                          </svg>
                          <span>Learn more about sharing</span>
                        </a>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </fieldset>
              </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Action buttons -->
            <div class="shrink-0 border-t border-white/10 px-4 py-5 sm:px-6">
              <div class="flex justify-end space-x-3">
                <button type="button" command="close" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-gray-100 inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 hover:bg-white/20">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="inline-flex justify-center rounded-md bg-indigo-500 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-white hover:bg-indigo-400 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500">Create</button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </form>
        </el-dialog-panel>
      </div>
    </dialog>
  </el-dialog>
</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div class="grid min-h-[800px] place-content-center bg-gray-900 scheme-dark">
  <button command="show-modal" commandfor="drawer" class="rounded-md bg-white/10 px-2.5 py-1.5 text-sm font-semibold text-white inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-white/20 in-has-open:opacity-0">Open drawer</button>
  <el-dialog>
    <dialog id="drawer" class="fixed inset-0 size-auto max-h-none max-w-none overflow-hidden bg-transparent backdrop:bg-transparent">
      <div tabindex="0" class="absolute inset-0 pl-10 focus:outline-none sm:pl-16">
        <el-dialog-panel class="group/dialog-panel ml-auto block size-full max-w-md transform transition duration-500 ease-in-out data-closed:translate-x-full sm:duration-700">
          <div class="relative flex h-full flex-col overflow-y-auto bg-gray-800 shadow-xl after:absolute after:inset-y-0 after:left-0 after:w-px after:bg-white/10 focus:outline-none">
            <div class="px-4 py-6 sm:px-6">
              <div class="flex items-start justify-between">
                <h2 id="slide-over-heading" class="text-base font-semibold text-white">Profile</h2>
                <div class="ml-3 flex h-7 items-center">
                  <button type="button" command="close" commandfor="drawer" class="relative rounded-md text-gray-400 hover:text-white focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500">
                    <span class="absolute -inset-2.5"></span>
                    <span class="sr-only">Close panel</span>
                    <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-6">
                      <path d="M6 18 18 6M6 6l12 12" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />
                    </svg>
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- Main -->
            <div>
              <div class="pb-1 sm:pb-6">
                <div>
                  <div class="relative h-40 sm:h-56">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1501031170107-cfd33f0cbdcc?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&h=600&q=80" alt="" class="absolute size-full object-cover" />
                  </div>
                  <div class="mt-6 px-4 sm:mt-8 sm:flex sm:items-end sm:px-6">
                    <div class="sm:flex-1">
                      <div>
                        <div class="flex items-center">
                          <h3 class="text-xl font-bold text-white sm:text-2xl">Ashley Porter</h3>
                          <span class="ml-2.5 inline-block size-2 shrink-0 rounded-full bg-green-400">
                            <span class="sr-only">Online</span>
                          </span>
                        </div>
                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-400">@ashleyporter</p>
                      </div>
                      <div class="mt-5 flex flex-wrap space-y-3 sm:space-y-0 sm:space-x-3">
                        <button type="button" class="inline-flex w-full shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-md bg-indigo-500 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-white hover:bg-indigo-400 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-500 sm:flex-1">Message</button>
                        <button type="button" class="inline-flex w-full flex-1 items-center justify-center rounded-md bg-white/10 px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-gray-100 inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 hover:bg-white/20">Call</button>
                        <div class="ml-3 inline-flex sm:ml-0">
                          <el-dropdown class="relative inline-block text-left">
                            <button class="relative inline-flex items-center rounded-md bg-white/10 p-2 text-gray-100 inset-ring inset-ring-white/5 hover:bg-white/20">
                              <span class="absolute -inset-1"></span>
                              <span class="sr-only">Open options menu</span>
                              <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-5">
                                <path d="M10 3a1.5 1.5 0 1 1 0 3 1.5 1.5 0 0 1 0-3ZM10 8.5a1.5 1.5 0 1 1 0 3 1.5 1.5 0 0 1 0-3ZM11.5 15.5a1.5 1.5 0 1 0-3 0 1.5 1.5 0 0 0 3 0Z" />
                              </svg>
                            </button>
                            <el-menu anchor="bottom end" popover class="w-48 origin-top-right rounded-md bg-gray-800 shadow-lg outline-1 -outline-offset-1 outline-white/10 transition transition-discrete [--anchor-gap:--spacing(2)] data-closed:scale-95 data-closed:transform data-closed:opacity-0 data-enter:duration-100 data-enter:ease-out data-leave:duration-75 data-leave:ease-in">
                              <div class="py-1">
                                <a href="#" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-300 focus:bg-white/5 focus:text-white focus:outline-hidden">View profile</a>
                                <a href="#" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-300 focus:bg-white/5 focus:text-white focus:outline-hidden">Copy profile link</a>
                              </div>
                            </el-menu>
                          </el-dropdown>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="px-4 pt-5 pb-5 sm:px-0 sm:pt-0">
                <dl class="space-y-8 px-4 sm:space-y-6 sm:px-6">
                  <div>
                    <dt class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 sm:w-40 sm:shrink-0">Bio</dt>
                    <dd class="mt-1 text-sm text-white sm:col-span-2">
                      <p>Enim feugiat ut ipsum, neque ut. Tristique mi id elementum praesent. Gravida in tempus feugiat netus enim aliquet a, quam scelerisque. Dictumst in convallis nec in bibendum aenean arcu.</p>
                    </dd>
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <dt class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 sm:w-40 sm:shrink-0">Location</dt>
                    <dd class="mt-1 text-sm text-white sm:col-span-2">New York, NY, USA</dd>
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <dt class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 sm:w-40 sm:shrink-0">Website</dt>
                    <dd class="mt-1 text-sm text-white sm:col-span-2">ashleyporter.com</dd>
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <dt class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 sm:w-40 sm:shrink-0">Birthday</dt>
                    <dd class="mt-1 text-sm text-white sm:col-span-2">
                      <time datetime="1988-06-23">June 23, 1988</time>
                    </dd>
                  </div>
                </dl>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </el-dialog-panel>
      </div>
    </dialog>
  </el-dialog>
</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div class="grid min-h-[660px] place-content-center bg-gray-900 scheme-dark">

</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))

<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))

<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      for (let elDialog of document.querySelectorAll('el-dialog')) {
        let dialog = elDialog.querySelector('dialog')

        // Mark dialog as inert to prevent focus from moving inside
        dialog.inert = true

        dialog.addEventListener(
          'beforetoggle',
          (evt) => {
            if (evt.newState !== 'open') return

            // Fire normal events for initial value on focus if any
            for (let element of dialog.querySelectorAll('[data-initial-value-on-focus]')) {
              let value = element.getAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.removeAttribute('data-initial-value-on-focus')
              element.value = value
              element.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'))
            }

            // Then, after all events have been processed, allow focusing
            setTimeout(() => {
              dialog.inert = false
            }, 0)
          },
          { once: true },
        )

        // Now we can open the dialog
        elDialog.open = true
      }
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-dialog')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', onReady)
    }
  }
</script>
